title: Woke up today to the volume DOWN button not working. Has anyone experienced this?
content:
I'm curious if anyone has experienced this issue.

This morning the volume DOWN button stopped working.

The volume DOWN button physically behaves as expected. It clicks, does not stick, and does not exhibit any physical issues. The OS does not respond to the button clicks in any way. Volume control does not work. Camera shutter control via volume buttons does not work either, but only with the volume DOWN button. 
Volume UP works as expected.

Device is 20 days old.
Pixel 3 XL 128GB
